value.fullName: Natural Person resident of the US
value.label: Natural Person resident of the US

value.fullName: Estate of descendent who was a resident of the US at their time of death
value.label: Estate of descendent who was a resident of the US at their time of death

value.fullName: Any legal entity with its principal place of business in the United States
value.label: Any legal entity with its principal place of business in the United States

value.fullName: Any pension plan that has any US employees
value.label: Any pension plan that has any US employees

value.fullName: Any trust governed by the laws of the United States
value.label: Any trust governed by the laws of the United States

value.fullName: Any commodity pool, pooled account, investment fund, or other collective investment vehicle majority owned by the US and offered to US Persons
value.label: Any commodity pool, pooled account, investment fund, or other collective investment vehicle majority owned by the US and offered to US Persons

value.fullName: Any legal entity majority owned by a US Person
value.label: Any legal entity majority owned by a US Person

value.fullName: Any individual or joint account where the beneficial owner is a US person
value.label: Any individual or joint account where the beneficial owner is a US person
